# Copilot Instructions for Timer Management Web App

## Project Overview
React web application for managing customer timers in a gaming/play area business. Features admin dashboard and customer view with real-time countdowns.

## Technical Stack
- React with Vite
- Tailwind CSS
- React Router (routes: /admin, /customer)
- QR Code generation (qrcode.react)
- Mali Thai font from Google Fonts
- State management: useState (no localStorage)

## Project Structure
- Admin Dashboard (/admin): Customer management, timer controls, QR code display
- Customer View (/customer): Real-time countdown display, payment status

## Development Guidelines
- Use functional components with React hooks
- Keep state in App component, pass down via props
- Real-time countdown updates every second
- Responsive design for mobile devices
- Colorful UI suitable for entertainment business

## Status
Project setup in progress.
